oai_dc:dc.dc:subject: Chekhov, Anton Pavlovich, 1860-1904 -- Wild Honey
Drama -- Lebanon
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: The American University of Beirut, Civilization Sequence Program & the AUB Drama Club present "Wild Honey" a newly rediscovered play by Anton Chekhov, adapted by Michael Frayn; Director Peter Shebaya; Producer/designer David Kurani. June 4-6, 11-13, at 7:30 PM. Ticket prices 5000 and 7000 L.L at AUB West Hall.
oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Wild Honey
